description:
A precise, durable truing stand. It's a time tested design that's built to survive the rigour of everyday use in the shop, and should turn out to be the only wheel truing stand you'll ever need.

  • Made of powder-coated heavy gauge steel
  • Compatible with wheels up to 29in. with or without tire
  • Compatible with hubs widths up to 175mm
  • Calipers accept rim widths up to 10.1cm
  • Knobs are strong and comfortable
  • Spring loaded caliper and caliper arms prevents binding
name: Park Tool TS-2.2P Professional Wheel Truing Stand
